mapper.update:
update sm_storage_head
warehouse_id = #{warehouseId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
storage_no = #{storageNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
storage_time = #{storageTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
extra = #{extra,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
dr = #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where storage_head_id = #{storageHeadId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sm_storage_head set warehouse_id = #{warehouseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, storage_no = #{storageNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, storage_time = #{storageTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, extra = #{extra,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dr = #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT} where storage_head_id = #{storageHeadId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.sql: sh.storage_head_id, sh.storage_no, sh.extra, w.warehouse_name, sb.storage_body_id,sb.material_id, m.material_name, m.material_model, su.supplier_name, l.location_no,sb.car_brand, sb.accept_num,sb.accept_time
mapper.select:
select
from sm_storage_head sh left join si_warehouse w on sh.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id left join sm_storage_body sb on sh.storage_head_id = sb.storage_head_id left join si_location l on sb.location_id = l.location_id left join si_material m on sb.material_id = m.material_id left join si_supplier su on m.supplier_id = su.supplier_id where sh.dr = 1 and sh.storage_head_id = #{shid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
